EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Account.Contact__c}, Congratulations on the successful launch of your new website! üéâ We know you‚Äôre excited, and you might be wondering, ‚ÄúWhat‚Äôs next?‚Äù Don‚Äôt worry, we‚Äôve got you covered! The Luxury Presence Support team is here for you, offering assistance through chat, email, and phone. Below, you‚Äôll find all the ways to get in touch with us, along with some helpful resources. Please watch this short video about Luxury Presence Support.
Chat: Live chat with us from the platform (24/7) Phone: 310-955-1077 Email: support@luxurypresence.com (24/7)
In the next few days, we‚Äôll send over a few more resources showing you how to easily make updates to your website. In the meantime, feel free to explore our Knowledge Base for helpful tips. And of course, if you have any questions at all, our support team is just a message away.

Best regards, The Luxury Presence Support Team
